database.name: VIEW SESCR_INVOICE_PAYMENT_V
database.view: SELECT ci.c_invoice_id, fp.fin_paymentmethod_id, fpm.em_sswh_value, sum(fp.amount) AS amount, psd.amount as amt_line FROM c_invoice ci LEFT JOIN fin_payment_schedule ps ON ps.c_invoice_id = ci.c_invoice_id LEFT JOIN fin_payment_scheduledetail psd ON psd.fin_payment_schedule_invoice = ps.fin_payment_schedule_id LEFT JOIN fin_payment_detail pd ON pd.fin_payment_detail_id = psd.fin_payment_detail_id LEFT JOIN fin_payment fp ON fp.fin_payment_id = pd.fin_payment_id LEFT JOIN fin_paymentmethod fpm ON fpm.fin_paymentmethod_id = fp.fin_paymentmethod_id GROUP BY ci.c_invoice_id, fp.fin_paymentmethod_id, fpm.em_sswh_value, psd.amount
